column2: Thank you for your review. I'm sorry to hear you had a bad experience with our service. Would it be at all possible to glean a little more information from you? Do you remember your server's name or a basic description? I'd like to get to the bottom of this because we do not train (or tolerate) this type of behavior from our servers; moreover
column3: I find it difficult to believe that any of our servers could be described as unfriendly or argumentative. Lastly
column4: can you tell me which dishes you tried that did not match the menu descriptions? Thank you in advance for your time and assistance.
